# Class KnowledgeCollection

Class representing a collection of knowledge records. Manages a set of knowledge entries with their embeddings for retrieval.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy setKnowledgeRecords

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this knowledge collection.

#### Returns void




### setKnowledgeRecords

  * setKnowledgeRecords(embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder), knowledge: string[]): Promise<void>

Sets or updates the knowledge records in this collection. Creates embeddings for each knowledge record.

#### Parameters

    * embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)

Text embedder to use for generating embeddings

    * knowledge: string[]

Array of knowledge text entries

#### Returns Promise<void>
